org.springframework.boot.actuate.autoconfigure.metrics

Class JvmMetricsAutoConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.boot.actuate.autoconfigure.metrics.JvmMetricsAutoConfiguration

  • @Configuration(proxyBeanMethods=false)
 @AutoConfigureAfter(value=MetricsAutoConfiguration.class)
 @ConditionalOnClass(value=io.micrometer.core.instrument.MeterRegistry.class)
 @ConditionalOnBean(value=io.micrometer.core.instrument.MeterRegistry.class)
public class JvmMetricsAutoConfiguration
extends Object
    Auto-configuration for JVM metrics.

    2.1.0
    Author:
